name: Pyta's Tale
description:
Pyta's Tale

Pyta's tale is a Bullet-Hell type game about the story of Pyta, a beginner Magician who is lost in an unknown place, so she decides to escape, but before that,  she needs to fight against 4 beasts that prevent her from passing.

HOW TO PLAY?

WASD/Arrows/Left Analog - movement

Cursor - Move Weapon

Left-click - Shoot weapon

Music By  Delga

Game participating in the "Bullet Hell Jam 2022"
